name: halloween blood splat!!! coaster
notes:
free blood splat!!! coaster pattern 

perfect for halloween and super easy to make! it is written in us crochet terms and only needs a small amount of any dk yarn.

why not try making it in green for zombie vomit?  or orange for pumpkin guts? let your imagination run wild...

if you're interested in the darker side of crochet please take a look at the other items in my etsy and ravelry shop 

tag me in your makes @the_coed_candy
